secondRow.title: This is a revolution in possibilities world
secondRow.subtitle: - our CTO, Poltava arsonist
secondRow.description: Well, I like how it burns, how people hustle and bustle, the firecrackers come. Well, people are in shock, their eyes are popping out. Well, it's funny to me: he looks at how they run, fuss, ask questions, extinguish it with his hands, and it burns even more fiercely. And I stand below and laugh.

thirdRow.title: My trust in a conscious society is unbreakable.
thirdRow.subtitle: - our CEO, Chervonograd Student
thirdRow.description: Since my childhood I found a fiercing spark of manners and politeness in peoples eyes. That is why I am willing to make their possibilities unlimited.
